title: In-Game Ranked Tiers vs TBM Ratings
description:
This graph shows the distribution of TBM ratings for each in-game ranked tier. For each rank, the box captures the 25th, 50th, and 75th percentiles (1st, 2nd, and 3rd quartiles), while the whiskers denote the minimum and maximum ratings.

If you're wondering why you should care about TBM ratings, see the TBM Discord for personalized stats.
summary: What in-game tiers are related to what TBM ratings
